channel.title: Text analysis on Robert Myles McDonnell
channel.description: Recent content in Text analysis on Robert Myles McDonnell

item.title: text analysis of metal lyrics in R
item.description: library(tidyverse) metal <- data_frame(Title = c("South of Heaven", "Seasons in the Abyss", "Raining Blood", "Live Undead", "Angel of Death", "Cowboys From Hell", "Five Minutes Alone", "War Nerve", "Goddamn Electric", "Walk", "Master of Puppets", "Blackened", "Sad But True", "Fade to Black", "Battery", "I am the Black Wizards", "Inno A Satana", "The Prophet", "Thus Spake the Night Spirit", "Ye Entrancemperium", "Black Seeds of Vengeance", "Masturbating the War God", "To Dream of Ur", "The Wind of Horus", "Lashed to the Slave Stick"), Band = c(rep("slayer", 5), rep("pantera", 5), rep("metallica", 5), rep("emperor", 5), rep("nile", 5)), Url = "https://genius.
